name: Turmoil in Tornado Town
description:
Save the people who are stuck in the eye of a giant tornado by bringing them to the shelter. Choose between 3 cars: the regular car, the race car and the truck.

Best played with controller.

Made by:

  • Senne De Boeck
  • Jelle De Greef
  • Florian Heynen
  • Quinten Baghuis

@DAE Creaweek Game Jam
